## "zombie" 🧟️ ideas

-   Ideas that are dead but refuse to die

::::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
(high heterogenity makes these unreliable)

1)  Trim and Fill
2)  Egger’s Regression
3)  Fail-safe N
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
(low power makes these unreliable)

4)  Vote Counting
5)  Over-reliance on p-values
:::
:::::

## More Zombies 🧟️

-   Funnel plots

    -   Funnel plots do not work when you have non-independent effect sizes (e.g. multiple effects from the same paper) or if you're running multi-level models.

    -   Small studies and large studies often have very different designs and procedures
